actions.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 226 (Roll no. 411).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. King (IA).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 226 (Roll no. 411).

description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 116-126 to strike the section 126 of the underlying bill which prohibits the use of funds from the Department of the Treasury's Forfeiture Fund to plan, design, construct or carry out a project to construct a southern Border Wall or barrier along the southern border of the US.
purpose: Amendment sought to strike section 126 which prohibits the use of funds from the Department of the Treasury's Forfeiture Fund to plan, design, construct or carry out a project to construct a southern border wall or barrier along the southern border of the US.
